description: Creates an object in the 3D space.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Type of object (e.g., cube, sphere, pyramid)

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: Color of the object (e.g., red, blue, green)

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X-coordinate for the object's position

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y-coordinate for the object's position

parameters.name: z
parameters.description: Z-coordinate for the object's position

description: Moves an object to a new position.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Type of object to move (e.g., cube, sphere, pyramid)

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X-coordinate to move the object to

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y-coordinate to move the object to

parameters.name: z
parameters.description: Z-coordinate to move the object to

description: Rotates an object around an axis.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Type of object to rotate (e.g., cube, sphere, pyramid)

parameters.name: axis
parameters.description: Axis of rotation (x, y, or z)

parameters.name: degrees
parameters.description: Number of degrees to rotate the object

description: Scales an object by a given factor.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Type of object to scale (e.g., cube, sphere, pyramid)

parameters.name: scale-factor
parameters.description: Scaling factor (e.g., 1.5 for 1.5 times bigger)

description: Deletes an object from the scene.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Type of object to delete (e.g., cube, sphere, pyramid)

description: Changes the color of an object.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Type of object (e.g., cube, sphere, pyramid)

parameters.name: new-color
parameters.description: New color for the object (e.g., blue, red)

description: Applies a texture to an object.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Type of object (e.g., cube, sphere, pyramid)

parameters.name: texture
parameters.description: Texture to apply (e.g., wood, glass)

description: Sets the transparency level of an object.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Type of object (e.g., cube, sphere, pyramid)

parameters.name: transparency
parameters.description: Transparency level (0 to 1)

description: Duplicates an object and places it at a new location.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Type of object to duplicate (e.g., cube, sphere, pyramid)

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X-coordinate for the new object's position

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y-coordinate for the new object's position

parameters.name: z
parameters.description: Z-coordinate for the new object's position
